Manchester United have been handed a boost in their hopes of signing Real Madrid forward Marco Asensio.

articles.title: Manchester United hold further talks with Newcastle over loan deal for goalkeeper Dubravka - Daily Mail
articles.description: Manchester United have held further discussions with Newcastle United over a loan deal for goalkeeper Martin Dubravka with a £5million option to buy.
